item.title: Sophie add a quote by Susan Kay
item.description: "None of us can choose where we shall love..." -- Susan Kay

item.title: Sophie add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "Poets have been mysteriously silent on the subject of cheese." -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: Sophie add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Fairy tales are more than true: not because they tell us that dragons exist, but because they tell us that dragons can be beaten." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Sophie add a quote by G. K. Chesterton
item.description: "Music with dinner is an insult both to the cook and the violinist." -- G. K. Chesterton

item.title: Sophie add a quote by Victor hugo
item.description: "Music expresses that which cannot be put into words and that which cannot remain silent" -- Victor hugo

item.title: Sophie add a quote by Gaston Leroux
item.description: "Tonight I gave you my soul, and I am dead." - Christine, from Gaston Leroux's: The Phantom of the Opera." -- Gaston Leroux

item.title: Sophie add a quote by Tite Kubo
item.description: "Do you know why the big brother is born first? It’s to protect the little brothers and sisters that come after him. A brother telling his sister, "I’ll kill you"... You never, ever say something like that." -- Tite Kubo

item.title: Sophie add a quote by Dylan Thomas
Sophie add a quote by Dylan Thomas
item.description: "Somebody's boring me. I think it's me." -- Dylan Thomas

item.title: Sophie add a quote by Gaston Leroux
item.description: "Everyone dies. I just choose the time and place for some of them!" -- Gaston Leroux

item.title: Sophie add a quote by Billy Sunday
item.description: "Going to church doesn’t make you a Christian any more than going to a garage makes you an automobile." -- Billy Sunday

item.title: Sophie add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "From there to here, from here to there, funny things are everywhere!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Sophie add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Sophie add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Sophie add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is hard enough to remember my opinions, without also remembering my reasons for them!" -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Sophie add a quote by Jonathan Swift
item.description: "May you live every day of your life." -- Jonathan Swift

item.title: Sophie add a quote by Heraclitus
Sophie add a quote by Elaine May
item.description: "The only safe thing is to take a chance." -- Elaine May

item.title: Sophie add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "I became insane, with long intervals of horrible sanity." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Sophie add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "I felt that I breathed an atmosphere of sorrow." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Sophie add a quote by Percy Bysshe Shelley
item.description: "A poet is a nightingale who sits in darkness and sings to cheer its own solitude with sweet sounds." -- Percy Bysshe Shelley

item.title: Sophie add a quote by Gaston Leroux
item.description: "I tore off my mask so as not to lose one of her tears... and she did not run away!...and she did not die!... She remained alive, weeping over me, weeping with me. We cried together! I have tasted all the happiness the world can offer." -- Gaston Leroux
